alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 17 at 5:30PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL REMAIN ACROSS NORTHERN ERIE AND WESTERN GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing extremely heavy snow at the rate of 1 to 2 inches per hour. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 526 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was over the Buffalo northtowns including Tonawanda, Williamsville, and Clarence extending east to Corfu and Akron. The band will remain nearly stationary through 700 PM. After this the band will move slowly southward during this evening. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Buffalo, Cheektowaga, West Seneca, Clarence, Lackawanna, Kenmore, Depew, Amherst, Tonawanda, Lancaster, Williamsville, Darien Lakes State Park, Grand Island, Pembroke, Akron, Small Boat Harbor, Erie Basin Marina, Alden, Corfu and Clarence Center. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 48A and 54. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
